title: The Phillip Island Mystery // Patreon Bonus Clip // Real Crime
description:
*BONUS EPISODE CLIP! In the summer of 1986, a young Australian woman working for a prominent family on a small island was found murdered in her home. Between a complicated crime scene, potential cover ups, and dozens of unanswered questions, this case proves to be incredibly baffling and will be sure to make you question every detail... right down to the letter A carved into the victims body. This is the murder of Beth Barnard, the disappearance of Vivianne Cameron, and the story of The Phillip Island Mystery.* *Listen to the rest at:* patreon.com/goingwestpodcast Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
